title: Assassination at Sarajevo: pretext for war
creator_credit: Isaac Kleinerman, John Sharnik and CBS News
brief_description: This film discusses how the chain of events following the death of Archduke Franz Ferdinand in Serbia, allowed Austria to seek revenge and precipitate the outbreak of World War I. Suitable for Upper Secondary-Tertiatry students.
